content: knitamazoo™ free pattern #106 variation on a theme a variation on the simple dishcloth pattern supplies 95 yds worsted weight cotton us size 8 needles tapestry needle row counter optional gauge not crucial knit at a gauge that gives you a fabric you like note if you prefer a larger cloth repeat row 9 & 10 until the length from the cast on corner to the needle is as large as you d like then work row 49 & 50 until 11 sts remain and then work row 83-89 co 3 sts row 1 knit across row 2 k1 kfb k1 4 sts row 3 k2 yo k2 5 sts row 4 and all even numbered row knit across row 5 k2 yo k1 yo k2 7 sts row 7 k2 yo k1 sl1 k1 yo k2 row 9 k2 yo k1 sl1 k1 repeat across until last 3 sts k1 yo k2 abbreviations row 10 knit co cast on row 11-48 repeat row 9 & 10 until you have 49 sts on your needle bobble bind off st s stitch es k knit row 49 k1 ssk yo ssk sl1 k1 sl1 repeat across to last 5 sts p purl k2tog yo k2tog k1 k2tog knit 2 together row 50 knit across sl slip next st on left needle as if to purl repeat row 49 & 50 until you have 11 sts left on your needle ndl needle ssk slip slip knit slip the next 2 sts as if to knit one at a time insert row 83 k1 ssk yo ssk sl1 k2tog yo k2tog k1 9 sts left ndl in the front of these 2 sts row 85 k1 ssk yo s1k2psso yo k2tog k1 7 sts and knit together row 87 k1 ssk yo s1k2psso k1 5 sts sl1 - k2tog - slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped row 89 k1 s1k2psso k1 3 sts psso stitch over the k2tog yo yarn over bind off remaining 3 sts & weave in ends copyright © knitamazoo™ 2012 for noncommercial personal use only all rights reserved www knitamazoo com
